room_title: Escape room "Lethal Lab Level 3" by Mystery Quests in Colorado Springs
room_address: 5526 N. Academy Blvd. Suite 203, Colorado Springs,‎ CO‎ 80918
room_description:
Vials of bioterrorism bacteria have gone missing. Lab mice infected with deadly viruses have escaped, and wild rodents have been found making nests with research waste. You and your federal bio-terrorism team are notified of a scientist who is missing from a Level 3 Bio-Terrorism Laboratory in Colorado.
Can you identify where the terrorists have taken her? Will you locate the antidote to the deadly infectious agent? The clock is ticking….in the Lethal Lab Level 3.
